title: Mafia 2 Director's Cut Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Live the life of Vito Scaletta, a small-time gangster with plenty of ambition and a talent for taking care of business. As Vito rises through the ranks of a powerful mob family, he soon discovers that life as a wise guy is as dangerous as it is glamorous.

In a gripping and stylish action adventure, Vito must prove himself an efficient enforcer, a skilled getaway driver, and a reliable hit-man. Set in a mythic post-war America, Mafia II: Directorâ€™s Cut tells an intense story of friendship, loyalty, betrayal and revenge. 

Mafia II: Digital Deluxe Edition is available for Mac from Steam and the Feral Store, it comprises:

Mafia II base game.
Made Man Pack â€“ Free access to in-game downloadable pack that lets players get behind the wheel of two different luxury automobiles modeled after classic cars from the period. In addition, Vito will look the part with two new â€œmade manâ€ suits, including a vintage tux.
Digital Art Book â€“ Get to know the families of Empire Bay with a photo album-style Digital art book that takes fans through the process of art directing the game.
Orchestral Soundtrack â€“ Immerse yourself in Empire Bayâ€™s period music with the Mafia II score recorded by the Prague FILM Harmonic Orchestra.
Digital Map of Empire Bay â€“ Get familiar with the neighborhoods and own the streets with the Digital map depicting the 10 square miles of Empire Bay and all the hangout spots.
Also available
Three expansion packs are also available separately on Steam: Jimmy's Vendetta, Betrayal of Jimmy, and Joe's Adventures, which feature over 20 hours of bonus content.
There are also four razor-sharp Style Packs, also available separately.



Minimum Requirements
OS: Mac OS X 10.10.5 Processor Intel 2.0 GHz RAM 4GB Hard Disk 13GB Graphics 512MB Input Multi-button Mouse
Recommended Requirements
OS:Mac OS X 10.11.6 or higher Processor Intel 2.4 GHz RAM 8GB Hard Disk 13GB Graphics 2GB Input Gamepad
The following graphics cards are not supported: AMD Radeon HD 4xxx series, ATI HD2xxx series, ATI X1xxx series, Intel GMA series, Intel HD 515, Intel HD3000, Intel HD5300, NVIDIA 9xxx series, NVIDIA 8xxx series, NVIDIA 7xxx series and NVIDIA 3xx series. The following cards require you to have 8GB of System RAM: Intel HD4000, Intel HD6000, and Intel HD5000.

This game is not currently supported on volumes formatted as Case-sensitive.

Due to a driver issue, Intel HD 4000 graphics cards are not currently supported for players who have OS X Mountain Lion 10.8.3 installed.


Tested and working on Hackintosh (Custom Mac) running MacOS Sierra with 
CPU: Intel i5 4690K 
Crucial 1333MHz RAM Sticks:(2x8GB) 16GB RAM 
GPU: EVGA GTX 750 FTW 2GB VRAM
